<Heading
  as={"h1"}
  className={"openapi__heading"}
  children={"Assign subtasks to group"}
>
</Heading>

<MethodEndpoint
  method={"post"}
  path={"/api/v1.0/subtasks/group/assign"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



Assigns multiple subtasks to an existing subtask group, allowing you to organize related work items together for batch management and visibility.

**Prerequisites**
1. **SubtaskGroupId** – Use [POST /api/v1.0/subtasks/group/new](/docs/api/tickets/create-subtask-group) to create a group, or [GET /api/v1.0/subtasks/my/groups](/docs/api/tickets/get-my-subtask-groups) to find existing groups.
2. **SubtaskIds** – Use [GET /api/v1.0/subtasks/\{id\}](/docs/api/tickets/get-subtasks-for-ticket) to list subtasks for a ticket.

**Workflow Example**
1. Create or identify group: [POST /api/v1.0/subtasks/group/new](/docs/api/tickets/create-subtask-group) → extract `Item.SubtaskGroupId`
2. List subtasks: [GET /api/v1.0/subtasks/\{ticketId\}](/docs/api/tickets/get-subtasks-for-ticket) → select `TicketSubtaskId` values to group
3. Assign to group: [POST /api/v1.0/subtasks/group/assign](/docs/api/tickets/assign-subtasks-to-group) with group and subtask IDs

**Related Endpoints**
- [POST /api/v1.0/subtasks/group/ungroup/\{subtaskGroupId\}/\{ticketId\}](/docs/api/tickets/ungroup-subtask-group-from-ticket) – Remove from group

  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}

  children={"Request"}
>

  parameters={undefined}

<RequestSchema
  title={"Body"}
  body={{"required":true,"description":"Assignment request including the group and subtask IDs.","content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"type":"object","description":"Request payload assigning a set of subtasks to a subtask group.","properties":{"SubtaskGroupId":{"type":"string","format":"uuid","description":"Identifier of the subtask group.","example":"33333333-3333-4333-8333-333333333333"},"SubtaskIds":{"type":"array","description":"Subtask identifiers to assign to the group.","items":{"type":"string","format":"uuid"},"minItems":1}},"required":["SubtaskGroupId","SubtaskIds"],"title":"AssignTicketSubtaskGroupRequest"}}}}}
>
  
</RequestSchema>
